dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So these two villages in North Kazakhstan, Zhambyl and Shagyrsai, have completely stopped selling and drinking alcohol.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So these two villages in North Kazakhstan, Zhambyl and Shagyrsai, have completely stopped selling and drinking alcohol.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Residents of two villages in the North Kazakhstan region have decided to stop selling and consuming alcohol, according to the regional prosecutor's office. As part of the Law and Order concept, the villages of Zhambyl and Shagyrsai made a significant step toward strengthening public order by fully rejecting the sale and consumption of alcoholic beverages.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it was a unanimous decision at their community meetings, right? Like, everyone agreed to support a healthier lifestyle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it was a unanimous decision at their community meetings, right? Like, everyone agreed to support a healthier lifestyle.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At community meetings in both villages, all attendees unanimously supported the initiative to promote a healthy lifestyle, the agency said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And the shop owners, um, they voluntarily took all the alcohol off the shelves. No more deliveries either.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And the shop owners, um, they voluntarily took all the alcohol off the shelves. No more deliveries either.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Local shop owners responded to the villagers' decision by voluntarily removing alcohol from their shelves and halting further deliveries.

dialogue_turns.text: That's pretty remarkable. I mean, it's not every day you see a whole community just decide to go dry like that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's pretty remarkable. I mean, it's not every day you see a whole community just decide to go dry like that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And it's part of this Law and Order concept they're pushing. The prosecutor's office was involved too, along with local authorities.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's part of this Law and Order concept they're pushing. The prosecutor's office was involved too, along with local authorities.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As part of the Law and Order concept, the villages of Zhambyl and Shagyrsai made a significant step toward strengthening public order by fully rejecting the sale and consumption of alcoholic beverages. dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder if other villages or even cities might follow suit. I read something about whether a whole city in Kazakhstan could ban alcohol.
